Uses of Interface
pl.touk.hades.FailoverActivator

Packages that use FailoverActivator
pl.touk.hades Provides a HA (high-availability) data source. 
pl.touk.hades.load Provides HA data source that switches between the two contained data sources (the main one and the failover one) on the basis of their load levels comparison. 
 

Uses of FailoverActivator in pl.touk.hades
 

Classes in pl.touk.hades with type parameters of type FailoverActivator
 class HaDataSource<T extends FailoverActivator>
          A data source which offers high-availability (HA) by enclosing two real data sources - the main one and the failover one.
 

Uses of FailoverActivator in pl.touk.hades.load
 

Classes in pl.touk.hades.load that implement FailoverActivator
 class LoadFailoverActivator
          A failover activator that activates failover when the main data source is overloaded in comparison to the failover data source.
